author: Andrew Chinasky
text: Who is Gauff, the 15-year-old who beat Venus Williams?
bigText: Qualifier Cori "Coco" Gauff has the ability to reach the top of women's tennis, former champions say.

author: Vitaly Clochkovski
text: Tyler Skaggs: Los Angeles Angels pitcher dies aged 27
bigText: The Los Angeles Angels baseball team has confirmed the death of pitcher Tyler Skaggs. He was 27 years old.

author: Eric Bayron
text: Trump in the UK: Who is Donald Trump's daughter Tiffany?
bigText: US President Donald Trump is on a state visit to the UK at the moment, and he's not travelled light.

author: William Petterville
bigText: Will robots make better farmers than humans? Algorithms, drones and robots can make farming a lot friendlier to the environment.
